p:
To determine the location of the mosquito traps, we used the existing latitude and longitude recorded in the IDPH database. In cases where the spatial data were missing, we geocoded the trap locations based on the address provided. Our analysis used all the trap locations recorded from 2005 to 2016 from Cook and DuPage counties in addition to any traps located within a 10 km radius from their boundaries (located within Lake, McHenry, Kane, Kendall, and Will counties). For each trap, the mosquito infection rate (MIR) was calculated by week and by year using the formula
1000 *
number
of
positive
pools
total
number
of
mosquitos
in
pools
tested
[ 40].
